block.p: SHAPIRO-Alexander, 86. Of Eugene, OR. Passed away Thursday. Previously of Belle Harbor, N.Y. and Hallandale, FL. Loving father of Bob Shapiro (Nancy). Cherished grandfather of Lynn and Marc. Great-grandfather of Jamie Belle. Funeral services will be held on Sunday, March 30, 1997, 1 P.M., in the Chapel. For information call Riverside-Gordon Memorial Chapel, 2230 Hollywood Blvd, Hollywood, FL. 33020. 954-523-5801.
